Description: Thirty-nine fragments of funerary papyrus; full colour vignettes and Hieroglyphic text, apparently same papyrus as EA 10466
Curator's comments: To be published by Guenther Lapp (Basel).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381157) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381157)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: displaced fragments, fractured Black ink Pigment Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass (cracked) Sandwich: board Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: C Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: incomplete/fragmentary
